meanings.definition: A person who designs and creates monograms.
meanings.sent1: The talented monogrammers at the shop created beautiful designs for the customers.
meanings.sent2: Monogrammers use their creativity to make personalized initials on items.
meanings.sent3: The monogrammers decided to play a prank by secretly adding their initials to all the products.
meanings.sent4: In a world of letters, monogrammers are the artists painting with initials.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammers' work stood out, making every item unique and special.

meanings.definition: The act of creating or designing monograms.
meanings.sent1: The monogrammers' precision in their craft was evident in every design they made.
meanings.sent2: Monogrammers take pride in their attention to detail when creating personalized initials.
meanings.sent3: During the monogrammers' competition, the fastest designer won by a single second.
meanings.sent4: The art of monogramming is like a dance, and the monogrammers are the graceful performers.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammers' dedication to their craft shone through in every intricate design.

meanings.definition: The business or profession of creating monograms.
meanings.sent1: The monogrammers' business flourished as more people sought personalized items.
meanings.sent2: Monogrammers offer a unique service by customizing products with initials.
meanings.sent3: The monogrammers' shop was so popular that they had to expand to meet the demand.
meanings.sent4: In the world of personalized gifts, monogrammers are the entrepreneurs of initials.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammers' profession required both creativity and precision to succeed.
